alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Deuel; Garden; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 9:18PM CDT until June 23 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Arthur County in west central Nebraska... Northwestern Keith County in southwestern Nebraska... Southeastern Garden County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Northeastern Deuel County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 900 PM MDT. * At 818 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lewellen, or 14 miles southeast of Oshkosh, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Lewellen, Lemoyne, Ash Hollow State Historical Park, Eagle Gulch Campground, Ruthon, Belmar, Clear Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Bluewater Battlefield State Historical Park, Otter Creek Campground and Windlass Hill. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 102 and 110. Highway 92 between mile markers 115 and 133. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for the Panhandle of, southwestern and west central Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for the Panhandle of, southwestern and west central Nebraska.
